contentrichtext.text: '''Zahedi''' or '''Zahidi''' may refer to: *[[Fazlollah Zahedi]] (1897–1963), Iranian general and prime minister *[[Ardeshir Zahedi]], Iranian foreign minister and ambassador *[[Nasser Zahedi]], German physician and artist from Iran *[[Caveh Zahedi]], American film director *[[Mahbub Jamal Zahedi]], ''[[Khaleej Times]]'' and ''[[Dawn News]]'' editor *The descendants of Sheikh [[Zahed Gilani]] (1216–1301) *A cultivar of the date palm (''[[Phoenix dactylifera]]'') ==See also== *[[Zahediyeh]], the Sufi Order founded by Zahed Gilani {{disambig}}
